ProjectKorra is for Spigot, which means it natively runs on Java Edition servers.

However, it is possible to make a Java Server with Bedrock support. By downloading and installing the two plugins, Geyser and Floodgate, it is possible to connect to the server as if it was a Bedrock server.

See bellow for guides on setting that up. Or, you can look for existing servers that support bedrock in <#923001974360772639>!
